long_description: The GoPro Protective Lens + Covers kit helps guard your GoPro lens against dirt, dust and scratches when using the camera without the housing. Perfect for use with The Frame mount (sold separately) or for handheld shooting with just the camera. The GoPro HERO3+ Protective Lens + Covers kit includes a camera lens cover, standard housing lens cover, replacement battery door and replacement side door for the camera. Compatible with all HERO3 and HERO3+ cameras.
short_description: The GoPro Protective Lens + Covers kit helps guard your GoPro lens against dirt, dust and scratches when using the camera without the housing.
